sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_devstudio.FileTypeMap</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>Mapping function to convert AppExplorerTree to a map of table names to their parent types as defined in Studio.</description>
        <name>FileTypeMap</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var FileTypeMap = (function() {
	var appExplorerStructure = AppExplorerStructure.create(),
		categoryTree = appExplorerStructure.categoryTree(),
		types = {};
	
	return {
		studioTypeForTable: function(tableName) {
			if (_.isEmpty(types)) {			 
				types = _.chain(categoryTree)
					.pluck('types')
					.flatten()
					.indexBy('id')
					.value();
			}
			return types[tableName];
		}
	};
})();
]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2016-01-19 21:29:36</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1c7a3cb537011200612747efbe41f121</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>FileTypeMap</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Studio" source="sn_devstudio">5d9789f3eb51310007e48c1cf106fe9e</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Studio">5d9789f3eb51310007e48c1cf106fe9e</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1c7a3cb537011200612747efbe41f121</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-01-20 05:49:14</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
